00029 #ifndef _AAL5REC_H
00030 #define _AAL5REC_H
00031 
00032 #include "in1out.h"
00033 #include "queue.h"
00034 
00035 class   aal5rec:        public in1out
00036 {
00037 typedef in1out  baseclass;
00038 public:
00039         void    init(void);
00040         rec_typ REC(data *, int);       // REC is a macro normally expanding to rec (for debugging)
00041 
00042         int     command(char *, tok_typ *);
00043         int     export(exp_typ *);
00044 
00045         uqueue  q;                      // queue to store cells until frame extraction
00046 
00047         // Statistic    
00048         int     cell_loss;              // detected cell loss
00049         int     sdu_loss;               // detected loss of AAL SDUs
00050         int     last_cell;              // sequence number of last cell
00051         int     last_sdu;               // sequence number of last valid SDU
00052         size_t  sdu_cnt;                // counter of AAL SDUs
00053 
00054         tim_typ delay;                  // delay of AAL SDUs
00055         double  delay_mean;             // mean delay of AAL SDUs
00056 };
00057 
00058 #endif  // _AAL5REC_H
